General.Name: Saudi Parts Center Company SJSC
General.Description: Saudi Parts Center Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail of spare parts of trucks and heavy transport, agricultural and industrial equipment, and construction equipment and machinery in Saudi Arabia. It offers intercoolers, blow-off valves and external wastegates, piping elements, and boost controllers; and engine components, cooling systems, seals and gaskets, undercarriage and turbocharger products, bearings, filters, pumps, G.E.T parts, hydraulic and electrical systems, and steering clutches and brakes, as well as hardware, transmission, fuel injection, power train, and frame and body. In addition, it engages in repair and maintenance of engines, and electric and steam generators. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Saudi Parts Center Company is a subsidiary of Alkhorayef Group Company.
General.Address: 8592 King Fahd Branch Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 12333
